name: Shling
description:
Shling is a game where you play as a bowl of miso soup that is determined to devour the cook who has the habit of murdering poor vegetables to create his dishes. The player embodies this bowl which must pursue and cut the cook.

Shling is a game produced during a gamejam on the theme "It's Not Supposed To Be That". It is an arcade game where the player embodies a bowl of miso soup that must chase a cook to cut it into pieces. He can also feed on vegetables which are shot by guns in the kitchen, shouting into a microphone slows down the speed of movement of the cook

The goal is to make the highest score in a limited time

If you want see more of my projects : https://loriusd5.wixsite.com/lorielparis
